mapper.sql: id, dividend_id, received_time, devidend_count, amount, total_received, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time, mgmt_fee
mapper.insert:
insert into dividend_history (dividend_id, received_time, devidend_count, amount, total_received, create_id, create_time ) values
( #{his.dividendId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{his.receivedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{his.devidendCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{his.amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{his.totalReceived,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{his.createId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{his.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.select: select h.*,d.order_id,d.order_no,d.member_id,d.create_time as order_time from dividend_history h left join dividend d on h.dividend_id = d.id where DATE(h.create_time) <= #{yesterday} and h.balance_status = 0
